name: Get Traffic Stats for Monday CRM leads with DataForSEO
description: Leverage DataForSEO Organic Traffic Stats in Monday CRM. Get accurate search traffic data to evaluate lead's potential, and improve your sales workflows. To get started, check our [Setup Guide for First Use](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1unnutgc9LraRdcMR6nJUISR8Co5iLAcaxOVXbc3NmfM/edit?usp=sharing).
